Quizzes.title: Career Assessment Quizzes
Quizzes.subtitle: Discover your strengths and find a suitable career direction with short, practical quizzes
Quizzes.emptyHint: Try adjusting filters or come back later.

QuizDetails.tip1: Find a quiet place and focus on the questions.
QuizDetails.tip2: Answer honestly — there are no right or wrong answers.
QuizDetails.tip3: Try to complete the quiz in one session.
QuizDetails.tip4: Your results will help suggest suitable career paths.

Results.heroTypeSubtitle: This result reflects the patterns and tendencies shown in your answers.
Results.topMatchesSubtitle: These professions align with your personality and interests
Results.noSessionResult: We couldn't find your result in this session.
Results.loginTitle: Sign in to save your results
Results.loginBody: You need to sign in to save your results and access them later.

Landing.title: Find your best career direction
Landing.subtitle: Quick visual quizzes that explain results and suggest professions.
Landing.trust: Guest mode available • Mobile-first • Clear explanations
Landing.feature1Text: Finish in minutes with a clean step-by-step flow.
Landing.feature2Text: Understand your profile and why careers match you.
Landing.feature3Text: Keep results in your dashboard after login.
Landing.ctaTitle: Ready to discover your career path?
Landing.ctaSubtitle: Start a quiz as a guest — save your results later if you want.

Errors.title: Something went wrong
Errors.subtitle: We couldn’t load this page. Please try again.

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.subtitle: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist.

MyResultsPage.Title: My Results
MyResultsPage.Subtitle: Review your completed assessments and explore your best matches.
MyResultsPage.TraitsSubtitle: Higher values indicate stronger alignment with a trait.
MyResultsPage.ProfessionsSubtitle: Based on your answers and model scoring.
MyResultsPage.PdfSoon: PDF download will be available soon

LoginPage.Title: Sign in
LoginPage.Subtitle: Welcome back! Continue to your dashboard.

ForgotPasswordPage.Title: Forgot password
ForgotPasswordPage.Subtitle: Enter your email and we’ll send you a reset link.
ForgotPasswordPage.CheckEmailSubtitle: If an account exists for this email, you’ll receive a reset link.
ForgotPasswordPage.CheckEmailBody1: We’ve sent a password reset link to your email (if it exists in our system).
ForgotPasswordPage.CheckEmailBody2: Check spam/junk if you don’t see it within a few minutes.

ResetPasswordPage.Title: Reset password
ResetPasswordPage.Subtitle: Set a new password for your account.
ResetPasswordPage.PasswordHint: Password must be at least 6 characters and contain at least one number.
ResetPasswordPage.MissingTokenSubtitle: This reset link is missing a token or has expired.
ResetPasswordPage.MissingTokenAlert: Please request a new password reset link.
ResetPasswordPage.SuccessSubtitle: You can now sign in with your new password.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect personal data when you use the Career Guidance Platform (the "Platform", "Service", "we", "us", or "our").
Privacy.description: The Platform provides career guidance through personality and aptitude tests, data analysis, and AI-based profession recommendations.

controller.title: 1. Data Controller
controller.text: The data controller is the operator of this Platform.
controller.contact: For questions regarding this Privacy Policy or personal data, please contact us at:

dataCollected.title: 2. Personal Data We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We collect the minimum data necessary to provide the Service.

direct.title: 2.1 Data You Provide Directly
items: Account information (email, encrypted password)
Optional profile data
Quiz responses and test results
Saved preferences (language, settings)

automatic.title: 2.2 Data Collected Automatically
items: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
Session data and usage logs
Cookies and similar technologies

guests.title: 2.3 Guest Users
guests.text: Guest users may complete quizzes without registration. Guest data is stored temporarily and may be deleted automatically unless converted to a registered account.

purpose.title: 3. Purpose of Data Processing
items: Providing career quizzes and displaying results
Generating personalized profession recommendations
Storing quiz history and analytics
User authentication and security
Improving system performance and usability
Ensuring legal and regulatory compliance (e.g., GDPR)

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR)
items: User consent (Article 6(1)(a) GDPR)
Performance of a contract (Article 6(1)(b) GDPR)
Legitimate interests, such as platform security and analytics (Article 6(1)(f) GDPR)
legalBasis.note: Consent can be withdrawn at any time.

ai.title: 5. AI & Automated Decision-Making
items: The Platform uses AI-based models to recommend professions based on test results
Recommendations are advisory and not mandatory
No legal or significant decisions are made solely by automated means
Users may review and retake tests at any time

security.title: 6. Data Storage & Security
items: Data is stored in secure databases
All data in transit is encrypted via HTTPS (TLS)
Passwords are hashed using strong cryptographic algorithms
Access is restricted via role-based authorization
Industry-standard security practices are applied

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
items: Account data is stored while the account is active
Quiz results are stored until deleted by the user
Users may delete their account and associated data at any time
Anonymized data may be retained for statistical or academic purposes

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
items: Maintaining user sessions
Improving usability
Storing language preferences
cookies.note: You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not function properly.

rights.title: 9. User Rights (GDPR)
items: Access personal data
Correct inaccurate data
Delete personal data (right to be forgotten)
Restrict or object to processing
Data portability
Withdraw consent at any time
rights.note: Requests can be made using the contact details above.

thirdParties.title: 10. Third Parties
thirdParties.text: We do not sell personal data. Data may be processed by trusted infrastructure providers strictly for operating the Platform under appropriate data protection agreements.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be published on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: 12. Contact
contact.text: If you have questions or complaints regarding data protection, please contact us at:

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.intro: These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of the Career Guidance Platform. By using the Platform, you agree to these Terms.

purpose.title: 1. Purpose of the Platform
purpose.text: The Platform provides career orientation tools, including quizzes, analytics, and AI-based recommendations, for informational and educational purposes only. It does not replace professional career counseling or psychological advice.

accounts.title: 2. User Accounts
items: Users may access the Platform as guests or registered users
You are responsible for maintaining account confidentiality
You must provide accurate and lawful information
One person may not use another user’s account

acceptableUse.title: 3. Acceptable Use
items: Misuse or disrupt the Platform
Attempt unauthorized access to systems or data
Upload malicious or unlawful content
Use the Platform for discriminatory or harmful purposes
acceptableUse.note: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate access for violations.

ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property
ip.text: All content on the Platform, including quizzes, text, UI design, algorithms, and databases, is protected by intellectual property laws and may not be copied, redistributed, or modified without permission.

aiDisclaimer.title: 5. AI Recommendations Disclaimer
items: Recommendations are generated algorithmically
Results depend on user input and model limitations
We do not guarantee accuracy or career outcomes
aiDisclaimer.note: Users should treat results as guidance, not absolute advice.

availability.title: 6. Availability & Changes
items: The Platform is provided "as is"
Features may be modified, updated, or discontinued
Temporary outages may occur due to maintenance or technical reasons

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
items: We are not liable for decisions made based on Platform results
We are not responsible for indirect or consequential damages
Use of the Platform is at your own risk

termination.title: 8. Account Termination
termination.text: Users may delete their account at any time. We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms.

law.title: 9. Governing Law
law.text: These Terms are governed by applicable data protection and consumer laws of the operating jurisdiction.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.text: For questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at:

AdminQuizBuilder.title: Quiz builder
AdminQuizBuilder.subtitle: Create a quiz in 3 steps and publish it

validation.min1: At least one item is required
validation.mixedPolarity: Cannot mix single and bipolar scales
validation.pairRequired: Both left and right sides are required
validation.pairIncomplete: Bipolar pair must have both left and right sides
validation.pairCodeMismatch: Left and right sides must have the same pair code
validation.weightsMissing: All traits must have weight values

init.title: Initialization
init.quizDescriptionPh: Write what this quiz is about
init.codeReadOnlyInfo: Code is auto-generated from the title and cannot be edited.

scales.title: Scales
scales.modeHint: Choose one type for the whole quiz. You can’t mix single and bipolar scales.
scales.modeLocked: Scale type is locked because you already added scales.
scales.name: Scale name
scales.chooseModeFirst: Choose the scale type to start adding scales.
scales.codeReadOnlyTooltip: Code is auto-generated from the name and cannot be edited
scales.codeAutoGenerated: Code is auto-generated from the name

questions.title: Questions
questions.noTraitsYet: No scales/traits yet. Go back and add scales first.
questions.selectTraitsHint: Select traits to enable weights for options.
questions.reorderNotSavedNotice: Order changed locally; will be saved after creating questions on the server.

results.title: Step 3 — Results
results.chooseCategoryToSeeProfessions: Choose a category to see professions
results.note: Selections are stored locally until quiz-results mapping endpoint is connected.

preview.title: Preview
preview.chooseCategoryToSeeProfessions: Choose a category to see professions

AdminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
AdminDashboard.subtitle: All your quizzes (drafts and published)
AdminDashboard.deleteConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this quiz?
